thread.title: U.S. Government Bonds Advance Before Inflation Data

author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Government Bonds Advance Before Inflation Data
text:
Longer-term U.S. government-bond prices gained Tuesday, a day ahead of the release of inflation data that some expect may mark a turning point in market sentiment.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year Treasury note fell from its highest closing level in more than four years to 2.837%, from 2.857% Monday. Bond yields fall when prices rise.
Investors...
